keyBenefits.title: Direct Distribution
keyBenefits.body: No intermediaries, Internet itself distributes your inventory P2P'

keyBenefits.title: Next Generation Sales Channel
keyBenefits.body: Make additional sales by opening you inventory to new sellers and payment methods.

keyBenefits.title: Control Your Data
keyBenefits.body: Manage your data securely and have realtime overview of bookings and inventory availability.

keyBenefits.title: Set up Rewards for OTAs yourself
keyBenefits.body: Now you decide how much fee seller will get as rewards for their job.
